Author: arilupe

Comment: Trump and his handlers are positioning themselves to be able to pull off something BIG coming up; like cancelling the midterm elections, dissolving/arresting members of Congress, or arresting/nullifying  the Supreme Court.   They need as many dependable (personally loyal to Trump over the Constitution)  command assets in place as they can get before they flip the switch on an op like that.     When that happens, there will likely  be a military coup attempt by members of the military still loyal to their Constitutional oath if Trump tries any of those things, and having more Trump ultra-loyalists already in power positions  within the military structure can minimize the impact of a coup against him.  "A dagger in the dark is worth a thousand swords at dawn"
Author: --John_Yaya--

Author: Nords1981
